channel.title: Getting Started with a 614 server
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I am new at private servers and don't really know a thing about them. I want to make a private sever that is a 614(or whatever is the most up to date) and I want it to be an offline server where I don't need the internet to use it. I just want it for personal use (basically to spawn npcs and take pictures of them) I don't know if this is possible but even if it isn't can someone please help me make a 614 server where I am the only one on it and I can spawn npcs.
Thank you very much. -w2drs21

item.title: Getting Started with a 614 server
item.dc:creator: @Raul_Bird Raul Bird
item.description:
@Raul_Bird wrote:

I send you an email. = )

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Started with a 614 server
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“Raul Bird, post:11, topic:357540”]So could I download a 562 that’s like moparscape? Meaning its only me on it and I can spawn npcs? and if possible can it be something I don’t have to download?

thanks -Raul Bird[/quote]
Yes like moparscape but you gotta download a server + client

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Started with a 614 server
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Raul Bird:

What I’m looking for is a 614 that’s already coded. Something like moparscape but a 614. For my own personal use. It wont be online.

614 are new to the RSPS community and there isn’t much done to them yet, in other words there isn’t many 614s that have everything like PvP and NvP or any working skills, the only 614s that do have them working are the ones that people are making projects for I don’t think theres any 614s to download yet that have combat etc.
But if you want HD graphics and most of the rs items I suggest you look for a 562 to download since there more developed already.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Started with a 614 server
item.dc:creator: @Raul_Bird Raul Bird
item.description:
@Raul_Bird wrote:

I found this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453459.0.html. Now how would I get it to work. I put the cache in the c:drive then I start the server by selecting run but once its done loading and I try to log in it says error connecting to server.

Thanks for your help.
-Raul Bird

Read full topic

thanks for your reply though. Also is there a way I can download a 614 that’s like moparscape off the internet.

-Raul Bird[/quote]
Try looking through the: Server Downloads

item.title: Getting Started with a 614 server
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Raul Bird:

Is there a way I could download a thing that lets me automatically play on a server that is a 614. So I don’t have to code and all that. For example something like moparscape but instead of being outdated compared to runescape it would be a 614. is there such thing?

You could play a 614 server created by someone else.
To see if there is any check the status page: www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Read full topic
